actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged in House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the first Sunday of September following Labor Day of each year as "National Grandparents Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the first Sunday of September following Labor Day of each year as "National Grandparents Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the first Sunday of September following Labor Day after each year as "National Grandparents Day".
A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the first Sunday of September following Labor Day of each year as "National Grandparents Day".
